channel.title: Trying to make a non pvp area wilderness
channel.description: Can someone please help me i have a server and all i need is for lumbridge to be the wild. and its ready to go. but i have looked at about 50 guides and cant for the life of me how to make a non pvp zone pvp. Can someone plz help me
